title: Famous Dams Quiz
description: Test your knowledge of the world's most impressive dams, from engineering marvels to controversial mega-projects.

questions.question: The Hoover Dam, completed in 1936, was built on which major American river?
The Three Gorges Dam, the world's largest power station by installed capacity, is located on which Chinese river?
The Aswan High Dam, completed in 1970, created Lake Nasser in which country?
The Itaipu Dam, one of the world's largest hydroelectric dams, sits on the border of Brazil and which country?
The Grand Coulee Dam, one of the largest concrete structures in the world, is located in which US state?
The Kariba Dam, which created the world's largest man-made reservoir by volume, is on the border of Zambia and which country?
The Tarbela Dam, one of the largest earth-filled dams in the world, is located in which country?
The Oroville Dam, the tallest dam in the United States, is located in which state?
The Hoover Dam straddles the border between Nevada and which other US state?
The Vajont Dam in Italy is remembered for what catastrophic event in 1963?
options: A massive landslide into the reservoir

questions.question: The Glen Canyon Dam, which created Lake Powell, is located on the Colorado River in which US state?
The Nurek Dam, one of the tallest dams in the world at 300 meters, is located in which Central Asian country?
The Guri Dam, officially known as the Simón Bolívar Hydroelectric Plant, provides most of the electricity for which country?
The Delta Works, one of the most sophisticated flood protection systems in the world, is located in which country?
The Tennessee Valley Authority (TVA) manages a system of approximately how many dams in the southeastern United States?
